articles.title: World-First Pig Kidney Transplant Was a Huge Breakthrough, But Is It The Future? - ScienceAlert
articles.description: In a world first, we heard last week that US surgeons had transplanted a kidney from a gene-edited pig into a living human.
articles.content:
In a world first, we heard last week that US surgeons had transplanted a kidney from a gene-edited pig into a living human.
